channel.title: Got into wreck
channel.description:
Well, December 18th I got checked out of school as it was the last day before a big holiday and this is common at my school. When I got home my mom wanted me to go run some movies back to Block Buster.. So I did.
I arrived at Block Buster and dropped off the movies. I had $10 and was feeling quite hungry as I didn't eat lunch at school yet. I didn't know where I was going to eat.. My final decision was Wendy's...
I got my meal at Wendy's and proceeded to leave, where the Wendy's, Krystal's (Like White Castle), Mcdonald's is a very bad road because cars fly up and down it and theres a big hill you can't see over.
When I went to take a left turn traffic was completely clear (I was sitting there for 10 minutes waiting for it to clear). I look one more time and pull out in the first lane I was tboned by a Big F150 truck (I was driving a small car) knocked unconscious and thrown through 7 lanes of traffic into a ditch on the other side.
My dad is a firefighter for that City (they do there shifts like work 24 hours and have 48 hours off). He was paged on a call, when he got there he had to watch me being cut out with the life of jaws and shit (must have to suck for a parent). I came conscious somewhere during this part long enough to tell the firefighter my moms cell phone number (vaguely remember)
Long story short I was life flighted to the best trauma center in GA and spent 6 horrible days in the hospital. I'm glad to say that I'm almost completely recovered since then, But I still have to use a wheel chair to get around (sucks when you live in a house with stairs).
In this horrid wreck I broke my hip in 5 places and ripped a hole the size of a half dollar in my bladder. I came close to dying from internal bleeding and my blood pressure dropping so quick.. But it's all good.
I had 3 tubes in me that sucked, One up my penis, One in the side of my stomach to drain blood and urine when it ripped, and one up my nose going down into my stomach.
Oh and also I have a 8 inch scar up my stomach and a bunch of little holes from the 37 staples holding my skin together.
Here are some pictures...
[IMG]http://i750.photobucket.com/albums/xx147/lethalsnow/l_e82936697eaa474bba6f001de00d6e73.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i750.photobucket.com/albums/xx147/lethalsnow/l_de1638feed794b7e973fc13e1177a8cb.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i750.photobucket.com/albums/xx147/lethalsnow/l_c73e3118b0f541f19be71e9073adb6b6.jpg[/img]

[IMG]http://i750.photobucket.com/albums/xx147/lethalsnow/l_988c4f72ade0486dbd30eb0dc6f3dbd6.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i750.photobucket.com/albums/xx147/lethalsnow/l_822d40369e6244a79ab5ad6e2cfbc13d.jpg[/img]

[IMG]http://i750.photobucket.com/albums/xx147/lethalsnow/l_56332525286b4c989c2409fce68baa25.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i750.photobucket.com/albums/xx147/lethalsnow/l_25a7f426f4ea41be95f1dc73ff366164.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i750.photobucket.com/albums/xx147/lethalsnow/1224091241.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i750.photobucket.com/albums/xx147/lethalsnow/1220091903.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i750.photobucket.com/albums/xx147/lethalsnow/0103102358.jpg[/img]
[size=5pt]Also, I don't like asking.. But its worth a shot. My medical bills are extremely expensive.. and the wrecked was placed into my fault.. So if you have any extra money laying around I would greatly appreciate any donation.
Paypal: Owner.projectpimp@gmail.com
Please don't think I posted to get money as well :\[/size]

@Yz85Racer wrote:

I’m lucky really, I’ve broken a SHITLOAD of bones but all of healed perfectly which will not restrict my ability to parachute/scuba dive. All I’ve broken was like, 6 ribs, 4 ankles (here’s a hint, don’t try jumps because people on 250s can do them l0l), femur twice, forearm, 4 compressions on my neck, 5 vertebrates compressed together (T3, T4, T5, T6, T7), 3 fingers and 4 toes… the latter is from MMA lool. Rest are just from Motocross.

item.description:
@Starting_up wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:122, topic:323872”][quote author=Starting up … link=topic=420275.msg3098204#msg3098204 date=1263520145]

No lol. I broke part of my spine in a Jet Ski accident. I had a hard time moving. But I could feel everything lol.

You’re an unlucky person, I bet your body is pissed at you.
[/quote]Probably. I’ve broken 3 vertbres in my spine both ankles (sucks dick) and now my hip and pelvis.

Wow, you’ve really been through the wars. If I count my surgery as my back breaking then its the only then that’s the only thing I ever “broke”, even though it was at the hands of a surgeon.[/quote]Well, I mean I didn’t really care… Because I was having fun when doing everything except the car wreck. Like when I broke my ankles… I was running from best friends dad jumped off a balcony which was like 20 ft high :S… Then Jet Ski, fell off the back having fun…

item.title: Got into wreck
item.dc:creator: @Starting_up Starting up ...
item.description:
@Starting_up wrote:

[quote=“maminerr, post:116, topic:323872”][quote author=Starting up … link=topic=420275.msg3097279#msg3097279 date=1263436338]

I’m not really familiar with all this maminerr banter because I’ve been constantly afk for the past 6 months. However, I have come to the conclusion that she must be female. I did this using my awesome observation skills, noticing little things like her avatar, and the way people refer to her as she. I have also noticed talk of big scars, and how maminerr is perhaps impressed by them.

Being a male blob, I feel the need to get into this banter myself. Apologies Freddie1990, the bank and all others involved. Possibly mopman?.. I saw that cheeky post. Using big words like immortalisation, which Firefox tells me isn’t even in the dictionary. I take your eyebrow scars and shovel faces and raise them 18 inches ((taken 2-3 years ago now http://c3.ac-images.myspacecdn.com/images01/94/l_74b95a9d47d7d93bc41f65e10b717446.jpg)

Apologies, I am currently in no more than 3 words “High as fuck” after having a joint in the bath.

You win. Your prize is Maminerr, shes a cock loving blond. Have fun

i dont think he’d really care for it, he wouldnt be able to feel his dick ><

[/quote]Ouch…

when you break your spine etc you lose all feeling from below the waist, atleast i think :S[/quote]No lol. I broke part of my spine in a Jet Ski accident. I had a hard time moving. But I could feel everything lol.

Read full topic
